title: 53B.57 NOTICE.
text: Every licensee or authorized delegate must include on a receipt or disclose on the licensee's website or mobile application the name and telephone number of the department and a statement that the licensee's customers can contact the department with questions or complaints about the licensee's money transmission services.

in: contact the department with questions or complaints
contact the department with questions or complaints
contact the department with questions or complaints

examples.receipt: name of the department, telephone number of the department, contact the department with questions or complaints

examples.website: name of the department, telephone number of the department, contact the department with questions or complaints

examples.mobile_application: name of the department, telephone number of the department, contact the department with questions or complaints

variables.name: receipt
variables.description: The receipt provided to the customer by the licensee or authorized delegate.

variables.name: website
variables.description: The website of the licensee or authorized delegate.

variables.name: mobile_application
variables.description: The mobile application of the licensee or authorized delegate.

consequences: The licensee or authorized delegate is compliant with the disclosure requirements.
